name: Fae Palace Rhianons room
description: Rhianon’s room smells faintly of lavender and regret. Everything is pristine, preserved, untouched — as if expecting a guest who keeps being reset to zero. The wardrobe hums when you’re not looking. The mirror shows a door that isn’t in this room. You try not to ask questions aloud.

puzzle.description: Rhiannon's presence fills the room. Only those attuned may understand her trial.
